mil6.3.9:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, kiṁ ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, udāhu dukkhena missan”ti?
mil6.3.9:2.1_1: vacanaṁ saddahāma ‘ekantasukhaṁ nibbānan’ti, evamettha mayaṁ, bhante nāgasena,
mil6.3.9:2.3_0: Ye te, bhante nāgasena, nibbānaṁ pariyesanti,
mil6.3.9:2.3_1: tesaṁ dissati kāyassa ca cittassa ca ātāpo paritāpo ṭhānacaṅkamanisajjāsayanāhārapariggaho middhassa ca uparodho āyatanānañca paṭipīḷanaṁ dhanadhaññapiyañātimittappajahanaṁ.
mil6.3.9:2.4_1: te sabbepi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi āyatane ramenti brūhenti,
mil6.3.9:2.5_0: Tumhe taṁ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanobrūhanaṁ hanatha upahanatha, chindatha upacchindatha, rundhatha uparundhatha.
mil6.3.9:2.7_0: Nanu māgaṇḍiyopi paribbājako bhagavantaṁ garahamāno evamāha ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti.
mil6.3.9:3.1_0: “Na hi, mahārāja, nibbānaṁ dukkhena missaṁ, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ.
mil6.3.9:3.2_0: Yaṁ pana tvaṁ, mahārāja, brūsi ‘nibbānaṁ dukkhan’ti, netaṁ dukkhaṁ nibbānaṁ nāma,
mil6.3.9:3.2_1: nibbānassa pana sacchikiriyāya pubbabhāgo eso, nibbānapariyesanaṁ etaṁ, ekantasukhaṁyeva, mahārāja, nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ.
mil6.3.9:3.8_1: rājāno paccante kupite tesaṁ paccantanissitānaṁ paṭisedhāya amaccehi pariṇāyakehi bhaṭehi balatthehi parivutā pavāsaṁ gantvā ḍaṁsamakasavātātapapaṭipīḷitā samavisame paridhāvanti, mahāyuddhañca karonti,
mil6.3.9:3.9_1: rajjasukhassa pariyesanāya pubbabhāgo eso, dukkhena, bhante nāgasena,
mil6.3.9:3.9_2: rājāno rajjaṁ pariyesitvā rajjasukhaṁ anubhavanti, evaṁ, bhante nāgasena,
mil6.3.9:3.9_3: rajjasukhaṁ dukkhena amissaṁ, aññaṁ taṁ rajjasukhaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhan”ti.
mil6.3.9:3.10_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ.
mil6.3.9:3.11_1: te kāyañca cittañca ātāpetvā ṭhānacaṅkamanisajjāsayanāhāraṁ pariggahetvā middhaṁ uparundhitvā āyatanāni paṭipīḷetvā kāyañca jīvitañca pariccajitvā dukkhena nibbānaṁ pariyesitvā ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ anubhavanti,
mil6.3.9:3.12_0: Evaṁ, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ, aññaṁ nibbānaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhanti.
mil6.3.9:4.1_1: uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhaṁ, aññaṁ nibbānanti.
mil6.3.9:4.6_1: ācariyā ācariyānaṁ abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānena udakāharaṇagharasammajjanadantakaṭṭhamukhodakānuppadānena ucchiṭṭhapaṭiggahaṇaucchādananahāpanapādaparikammena sakacittaṁ nikkhipitvā paracittānuvattanena dukkhaseyyāya visamabhojanena kāyaṁ ātāpentī”ti?
mil6.3.9:4.7_1: sippapariyesanāya pubbabhāgo eso, dukkhena, bhante nāgasena,
mil6.3.9:4.7_2: ācariyā sippaṁ pariyesitvā sippasukhaṁ anubhavanti, evaṁ, bhante nāgasena,
mil6.3.9:4.7_3: sippasukhaṁ dukkhena amissaṁ, aññaṁ taṁ sippasukhaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhan”ti.
mil6.3.9:4.8_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ.
mil6.3.9:4.9_1: te kāyañca cittañca ātāpetvā ṭhānacaṅkamanisajjāsayanāhāraṁ pariggahetvā middhaṁ uparundhitvā āyatanāni paṭipīḷetvā kāyañca jīvitañca pariccajitvā dukkhena nibbānaṁ pariyesitvā ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ anubhavanti, ācariyā viya sippasukhaṁ.
mil6.3.9:4.10_0: Evaṁ, mahārāja, ekantasukhaṁ nibbānaṁ, na dukkhena missaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhaṁ, aññaṁ nibbānan”ti.
